name: 陳秀慧　Office Hours
objective:
本課程旨在教導學生具備獨立思考有機化學的能力；因此課程分為基本觀念 (結構式與鍵結), 有機化學反應與反應機構以及化合物的製備與分析等三大部分。
The aim of this course is to educate students to think independently about organic chemistry. The course is divided into three parts;introductory material (concepts of structure and bonding);organic reactions and mechanism (sigma-bond chemistry followed by  pi-bond chemistry);and topics of more specialized interest.
schedule:
1. 課程說明
2. A review of General Chemistry: Electrons, Bonds, and Molecular Properties
3. Ch 1 A Review of General Chemistry: Electrons, Bonds, and Molecular Properties
4. Molecular Representations
5. Molecular Representations
6. Acids and Bases
7. Acids and Bases
8. Mid-Exam
9. Alkanes and Cycloalkanes
10. Alkanes and Cycloalkanes
11. Stereoisomerism
12. Stereoisomerism
13. Chemical Reactivity and Mechanism
14. Chemical Reactivity and Mechanism
15. Substitution Reactions
16. Substitution Reactions
17. Alkenes
18 Final-exam
remarks:
office hour：禮拜二 早上 10 點到 12 點
